user.title: Setup Hyperbase Connection
user.description:
Hyperbase Base URL uses the address of Hyperbase backend server. Check the configured Hyperbase Server Base URL on Hyperbase UI. 
 Please refer to Hyperbase configuration file for the MQTT connection information. For more information: https://hyperbase-book.hilmy.dev/04_features/12_change_server

error.invalid_entity: Please use alphanumeric or - or _ and no whitespace for connector entity name
error.entity_exists: This connection is exists. Use another name

select_entities.title: Collect New Device Data
select_entities.description: Connector Entity ID is used to identify notify entity. This integration use the entity to hold data collecting information. You can leave it default unless you create new connector entity for the same configured device.

remove_device.title: Remove Configured Device
remove_device.description: Removing configured device will stop data collection into Hyperbase. Please enter **{connector_entity_id}** to confirm

data.remove_device_confirm: Enter Connector Entity ID to confirm
